tool_description: Talk to mobile users inside your app. Used by m-commerce, SAAS and Subscription services, and mobile hardware companies to increase retention
name: Hipmob
title: Hipmob

api_list.name: Set User Status
api_list.description: Sets the availability status of the authenticated user.

api_list.name: Add Device Friends
api_list.description: Adds friends to the friends list of a specific device: these friends will now be able to send messages to this device, or receive messages from this device.

required_parameters.name: friend
required_parameters.description: The host application identifiers of the friends to add. Accepts 1 or more values.

api_list.name: Send Text Message
api_list.description: Sends a text message to the specified device.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The text of the message to be sent.

optional_parameters.name: autocreate
optional_parameters.description: The text true if the message should be sent regardless of whether or not the target host application identifier has been seen yet.
